main event: On May 3 and 6, 1960, a civilian reported a sighting of an unidentified flying object in West Hartford, Connecticut.
interesting points: The object was described as an oval, long shape with bright white pinpoint lights on a luminous red and green body,The object maneuvered in the sky and was observed for 10-15 minutes,The witness was in an area crisscrossed by many airways with numerous flying aircraft both military and civilian,The colors suggestive of running lights used on aircraft were noted,The witness has a background in aircraft observation, possibly affecting his perception of the sighting.
sighted object: an oval, long object with bright white pinpoint and luminous red and green body
witness description: A civilian possibly familiar with aircraft due to jet engine testing work
